properties.name: momoko.admin.password
properties.description: Password of the initial Admin user to be created

properties.name: momoko.admin.username
properties.description: Login ID of the initial Admin user to be created

properties.name: momoko.application-url
properties.description:
Client web application's base URL.
 Used in the verification link mailed to the users, etc.

properties.name: momoko.cors.allowed-headers
properties.description: Request headers to be allowed, e.g. content-type,accept,origin,x-requested-with,...

properties.name: momoko.cors.allowed-methods
properties.description: Methods to be allowed, e.g. GET,POST,...

properties.name: momoko.cors.allowed-origins
properties.description:
Comma separated whitelisted URLs for CORS.
 Should contain the applicationURL at the minimum.
 Not providing this property would disable CORS configuration.

properties.name: momoko.cors.exposed-headers
properties.description:
Response headers that you want to expose to the client JavaScript programmer, e.g. Lemon-Authorization. I don't think we need to mention here the headers that we don't want to access through JavaScript. Still, by default, we have provided most of the common headers.
See here to know why this could be needed.

properties.name: momoko.jwt.short-lived-millis
properties.description: Expiration milliseconds for short-lived tokens and cookies

properties.name: momoko.oauth2-authentication-success-url
properties.description:
The default URL to redirect to after
 a user logs in using OAuth2/OpenIDConnect

properties.name: momoko.shared
properties.description:
Any shared properties you want to pass to the 
 client should begin with lemon.shared.
